website_summaries.verdict: An extremely affordable cleaver that still offers good quality.
pros: 7-inch cleaver works well for bone cutting
100% stainless steel blade is easy to sharpen
Good weight and comfortable to hold
cons: The knife does require some sharpening before first use and the handle can damage over time

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last too long.
customer_reviews.text: I understand the reviews about how this product is awesome because it really is. The problem is what happens after a few months of not even heavy use. I literally used this like 10 times. I use a whetstone sharpener and my other victorinox knives sharpen back to how I got them when new. This one didn't do that. I have sharpened it 3 times now and it's just not the same. I guess for the price, I shouldn't be disappointed since it was cheap compared to dalstrong which is the one I want but it's over $100. Easy to use, good grip and sharp at first, yes. But again, the type of metal used doesn't sharpen well over time.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Started out nice, But.
customer_reviews.text: It started out nice but the handle cracked and is separating up close to the base. I would like a replacement but there is not an option for that.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this cleaver again or recommend it at all. The black part of the handle cracked the first time I used it and the blade has rough spots in it after chopping one time.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B

customer_reviews.title: Received someone's returned Item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a new knife, and received a return instead. Normally not a big deal, but the knife itself has been used quite a bit by the looks of the wear on the stainless steel. Ill be returning and purchasing from a different merchant and will stay away from Utopia Deals in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Moore

customer_reviews.title: I finally own a nice cleaver
customer_reviews.text: Had I known I could get a meat cleaver this nice for this price I would have bought it a long time ago. I make a lot of soups during the cooler months and this cleaver is heavy and sharp enough to cut a chicken thigh or pork chop into pieces, allowing the flavor from the bones to enrich the soup. And it's good looking too. It looks like I spent a lot more for it than I did. Having the right tools gives you the power to do things you couldn't do without them and because I own this, I'm a bit better at making a delicious soup.
customer_reviews.author: Carless Gay

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: My first cleaver purchase. I'm very pleased with this product, it performs very well. For me there was a small learning curve. It took awhile for me to figure out how to overcome my reluctance to swing it hard enough. I used this initially for some turkey wings, it's hard to explain, but if you want to cleave them, just swing the thing like you mean it, if you do this, it will go right through them first time every time. If you hold back, even a little, it will take 2 or 3 tries. After finding this out, it went through the drummettes easily and flawlessly. Separating the joints was like going through paper.
customer_reviews.author: pdangeruss

customer_reviews.title: Good knife for the price, easy poultry bone chopper
customer_reviews.text: Pictures don’t do it justice. I needed a cleaver to breakdown chickens and ducks. It is rather large and I have small hands, but was able to handle it with easy. It is a little intimidating as I normally used a knife 1/2 the size. But it cut through the bones with ease. I was able to breakdown a whole chicken in under 10mins. Was easy to remove skin and fat along with chopping bones. It is a pretty good blade for its price. Hopefully it lasts longer that some other reviews. Oh and hand wash only.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy knife
customer_reviews.text: Knife is great and seller is awsome. The courier delivered my knife to the wrong address and the seller was nice enough to refund me with no questions asked. I got another one delivered right after. The knife itself cuts well and has good weight to it. I do see some dents on the edge bit I don't know if this is typical. Never owned this type of cleaver before.
customer_reviews.author: Mojorisen

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke within 3 weeks of purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this. Within three weeks the handle broke. It is made up of very weak plastic. I loved this when it arrived. Well its a knife and yes it cuts pretty good. I used this just to cut meats and nothing else. But put some extra $ and get a durable one. Wasted my money. Very dissatisfied and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jaivik Shrestha

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, sharp blade, nice for chopping thick veggies like squashes
customer_reviews.text: Chops veggies nicely, I am not sure how it'd fare in cutting bone or fat off a piece of steak or chicken, nor for opening coconuts (the main reason I bought this). The blade is nice and sharp, though I must admit I am lazy and lament the fact that I cannot put this cleaver in the dishwasher lest it end up covered in rust. That's my only legitimate gripe, at this time.
customer_reviews.author: BeachGirl

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp, sturdy cleaver. It is well balanced and with perfect weight.
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp, sturdy cleaver. It is well balanced and with perfect weight. After cuted two pounds of pork to 2mm x 2mm x 50 mm threads, my hands felt nothing. I like the decoration at its handle too. I took one star off for the sharp front tip. Though I fully understand it could be designed like this for picking meat and tendon in small space, a round tip is still safer for such a sharp tool. A dedicate small knife can handle the picking well. It is only my personal preference...
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cleaver
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I have to chop through about 40 pounds of chicken with bones every week and I needed something up to the challenge. When I got this I was a bit hesitant that it would be heavy enough at such a reasonable price. I am delighted to say that when I got it I found it was nice and heavy but not too heavy and SHARP and ready to go! It cut though to the cutting board on each chop while I was processing chicken leg quarters! I have a sharpening steel and am able to keep that nice edge on there by steeling it as needed. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Darby

customer_reviews.title: Certainly hefty!
customer_reviews.text: This is a substantial blade on this thing. I can’t believe I’ve been married almost 39 years and have never had a cleaver. But again, maybe that’s why the wife has never killed me! This thing has good heft and a balanced feel. The blade shape looks appropriate. It seems fairly sharp, but I have a lot of different knives, so I fully expect to have to do some edge work to get it like I want. But it is decently sharp out of the plastic (terrible) packaging. I think I’ll be happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mangetout

customer_reviews.title: the black handle is broken about 1/2 inch from heel ...
customer_reviews.text: the black handle is broken about 1/2 inch from heel of knife. In this area you have a drop box which limits the size of box it will take. Too big of a deal to buy a box and ship it out. Will keep and be very leery of purchases next time. v
customer_reviews.author: Joanna L Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Lasted well, considering the price
customer_reviews.text: Feels good in the hand, came with a good edge, which wasn't hard to maintain. I raise meat rabbits, and kill maybe 40/year. This primarily used to remove the legs, with just a few other cuts. I use a 2" thick board to cut on. Today, with no warning at all, the handle just broke into 2 pieces very close to the blade, causing the blade to flip up and almost hit my leg. It was kind of scary. Never saw any cracks on the handle! Still, I had it over 2 years and used it a fair bit (Today I was on rabbit #6 when it happened) so I'm considering getting it again...
customer_reviews.author: T. Muise

customer_reviews.title: updated 2 STARs  from 5 Stars " i can not recommended this"
customer_reviews.text: Edited on 6/25/19 after getting a knife sharpener thats automatic (powered) after well over 20 times over each sidie i am finding this knife was never sharp some the start. (new this) and i am barly even able to get this thing even close to being sharp. had a very hard time chopping meat and other things.. i can not recommended this what so ever Edited on 3/4/19 After about 2 years I find this is very hard to sharpen and it dose not stay sharp what so ever. It gos blunt to easily when wacking meat. dulls quickly for the price this works really good for a soild pice of steel
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Need a better grip
customer_reviews.text: Thus meat cleaver works pretty well and is very sharp out of the package. It is a good deal considering its price. My only complaint is the handle. When wielding soemthing this sharp and usually with a lot of force behind it, you want a good grip so it doesn't slip when it contacts the meat. Other than that, it is a very budget friendly and decent starter cleaver.
customer_reviews.author: Nicol Bolas

customer_reviews.title: One Solid Piece
customer_reviews.text: BEST KNIFE EVER...I was surprised when I first took it out of the box, I was amazed at how heavy it was and for the price, WOW I got the knife sharpener, gave it a few pass through and went to work. It cut through chicken, Turkey necks and I broke down a slab of ribs in no time. I also told my Aunt who was looking for a clever about this one. The BEST thing is its 1 PIECE. No worries about the handle breaking off
customer_reviews.author: Marcella A

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cleaver for chopping ribs and the tips. This has a thicker solid stainless blade. It's heavy duty and made well. It has some weight to it, but it's not too heavy. Much better than I expected for the low cost. The price is not an indicator of the quality. I really just wanted in for ribs, but it did a fine job of chopping through a cantaloupe. I wll used it to chop cabbage, raw and cooked meats.
customer_reviews.author: Trend

customer_reviews.title: Four years later, still loving it!
customer_reviews.text: Some critical reviews report that their blades have gone dull. I have had mine for four years now and it is still sharp as ever! I wipe it clean after each use, dry with a dishtowel, and put it back on the hook using the convenient hole in the blade. This knife is heavy but balanced. I cannot compare it to a $100+ knife, but for an average kitchen it is quite adequate.
customer_reviews.author: rb.sr

customer_reviews.title: Typical Asian knife. Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knife because sometimes there is meat and bone to cut and I am used to use the Asian kitchen knife. This product has excellent cutting section and good Maneuverability. Not as big as the one I used and easy to hold and use. The function is keeping good after using it more than two months. Good price. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty For Sure!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this butcher knife to chop up pork, chicken, and other meats. I found it to be exactly what I needed - heavy duty and very sharp. This thing chops with ease. I immediately run it under water and dry it after using it. So far it has been a great purchase for all my kitchen needs.
customer_reviews.author: C. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Massive but sticky
customer_reviews.text: So far, I only used a handful of times to cut potatoes and onions. Maybe I am not used to with such a heavy knife but it's not easy to manipulate. While cutting onions, it was ok but when I was cutting potatoes, pieces of potatoes were kept sticking to the side of the knife... i don't like that part... I am thinking that the knife would be good to smash down on chicken bones to chop off but I haven't used the knife for that purpose. Will keep using a couple of more times and see if I should return or keep. So far, I am 55% on return.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp.
customer_reviews.text: It works really good. I can easily chop the meat and chicken bone. However, it is very heavy. I get tired easily while I am chopping with this knife. The edge near the handle does not have curve, which has very sharp pointy angle. I cut myself several times. Like I mentioned, it is very sharp knife, so the cut wound was very deep. Just be careful to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L

customer_reviews.title: Product broken in the handle
customer_reviews.text: The product is broken on the handle. I am really irritated when the first impression is like this. bad part is now I have to repack and return it for the mistake that whoever sent this has did.
customer_reviews.author: B.Albert

customer_reviews.title: Sharp cleaver. Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: The item that I initially ordered was broken in the handle. However, it is still doing its job: it is a very sharp cleaver that can cut off chicken skin and bone in ONE cut. I also use it to cut coconut and it works perfectly. I emailed the seller about the broken handle and they offered me a replacement for free. The new one arrived with no imperfections. In short, the cleaver does what I wanted. It can cut chicken and duck. I have never tried with heavy duty like big bones so I am not sure if it would do the job. I will update this review when I have a chance to try.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Tran

customer_reviews.title: CUTS THROUGH BONE!
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this so we can chop through bone and it sure does the job well. It is very sharp, so just be careful when you are using this item. We intended this to cut up chicken leg quarters into smaller pieces to feed our Husky since he got tired of all the work of chewing it all. So far, the plastic part of the handle has not broken yet and we have had it for almost a month now. Will update review if it ever does.
customer_reviews.author: Kali Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great clever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this clever! It's great for cutting up slabs of ribs, whole chickens, huge roasts, etc. I bought a leather cover to go with it and I'm thoroughly pleased that the clever is safe and well protected from any mishaps.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: This knife has good balance and feel
customer_reviews.text: If you ever peeked in the back of a Chinese restaurant you would know how effective this knife design is for rapid, effective cutting and chopping and transport of ingredients to bowl or pan. If you only had one knife, this could well be it, from chopping meat to finely slicing a clove of ginger or garlic.This knife has good balance and feel, and looks like it will hold a good edge to it. I would maybe caution any newbies to get some experience with standard french cooking knife first so you have good knife feel in your skill set, lest you add some fingertips to your latest creation, this not really a good knife for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Mister B

customer_reviews.title: bluntest chopper knife ever used! not qualified.
customer_reviews.text: Bluntest chopper knife ever used in my life. It is even hard to chop something like Butternut squash, not mentioning meat with bones. I cut myself twice the first two days I used it because it's so blunt so needs a lot of effort on the hands. AND I NEVER CUT MYSELF EVER IN COOKING, before using this blunt stuff. Definitely not qualified as a "Butcher Knife", unless you only use it to slice some chicken breast or fish fillet. It can't handle vegetables, meat with bones, or even slightly frozen meat.
customer_reviews.author: obi1992

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife set!
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife set. It looks nice and the knives came extremely sharp! I have not had a chance to use the cleaver yet but I expect the same results. I have not had any issues so far. I do wash and dry them as soon as I am done using them to make sure that they stay in good shape. They cut very smoothly for me. I would recommend this knife set to everyone, especially for the price. I looked at many different brands and saw many different price ranges. For the money you cannot beat this set! I never thought I would find a knife set that I could afford that would work so nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Dean

customer_reviews.title: Wow! This is a great cleaver!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this cleaver and I am actually shocked by the quality for the price. We own some "Global" cutlery which average $50 or more for a single knife, so we know what quality looks like. The solid tang of the blade through the handle, the feel and finish of the handle and weight, as well as the sharpness of the blade on arrival have me totally beyond satisfied. I had to go and pick up one of my $75 Global knives and wonder why we paid so much for it!
customer_reviews.author: johnnrosanna

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I used it yesterday first time and at first before cutting the meat, I was like no it's not sharp as our last one. But, once I started using it I feel like it's really good. I used only one time as of now but hoping to have the same feel in the future. If not i will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Cleaver
customer_reviews.text: Affordable, fast delivery. Well made cleaver, easy to handle. Note, not a toy. I’m experienced in using a cleaver when cutting vegetables or meats. This cleaver is great for use when cutting for precision slices or chops.
customer_reviews.author: CGS71

customer_reviews.title: NO COMPLAINTS
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few months and I have no complaints so far. It is sturdy, very good quality and it works for everything I've used it on. The blade is still the same, so I have not sharpened it. So far, so good
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: A Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was a bit intimidated by this clever. I set it aside and then I had some chicken to cut up for a dish I was making and used it. Oh my! This cut the chicken easily and precisely and I had thought it was too big for me to wield, but my fears disappeared as soon as I began using it. I am so happy I bought this clever. It is very substantial, well made and comes in a nice box with protection when not in use. I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Nicoll

customer_reviews.title: Seems quite solid, but doesn't have the weight of a meat cleaver
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and looked as described. It was packaged OK as well. Upon opening it, I felt that the cleaver did not seem to have the weight one would expect to need for cutting through meat, especially cartilage etc. But it is too heavy for normal use, so let's see if this gets used or just takes up space in the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: SudeepBose

customer_reviews.title: Quality Buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent weight and balance. Quality design and ergonomics. Sharp enough to cut fish and meat and some bones. Also used for fresh coconut. Of course you have to mantain it for its cleanliness and sharpness.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Nito

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knife! Great for basic home needs!
customer_reviews.text: Love the knife. It’s handy to use and robust in build. I was pleasantly surprised at the ease with which it cut through chicken. Yet to try it out on red meat. For an average home use, this is simply fantastic. Looks and feels premium in quality and is ergonomic and easy to handle for non professionals. If you’re searching for a decent looking cleaver that works, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Tauseef

customer_reviews.title: Came Cracked
customer_reviews.text: It was cracked right out of the box. Tossed it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Martha F.

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaver, a steal at its price!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! I ordered this relatively cheap cleaver not really expecting much... was I wrong!! This is a gorgeous, razor-sharp knife that I've used for all kinds of meats and vegetables. Be careful using... its sharp!! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Cuts very well... be careful. It is very sharp. I would suggest buying a cover as well... I had to wrap mine up in a dish rag until my cover comes in. Overall I am impressed
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: This knife is simply amazing! For $9, this is unreal. My husband was so skeptical at first, after chopping a whole rack of ribs, he was convinced. The knife was still perfectly sharp after all this abuse and guess what, the chopping board gave in and splitted into two. The knife was still sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Bai

customer_reviews.title: Great weighted cleaver for chopping BBQ
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use this cleaver for chopping Pork Shoulders for BBQ or chopping Chicken Breasts (for chicken tacos). The cleaver is very sharp, you can use the cleaver as a knife to slice Pork/Chicken. The weighting and sharpness, easily allow it to chop meats without have to overwork. It would have been nice if the cleaver came with a sleeve, to protect it in the drawer, but I easily made one for that purpose. Overall, I'd say this is a great cleaver for the price. I'm sure you can spend more and find better, but this is a great option for someone looking for a durable, sharp, & functional cleaver on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chopping and slicing are made easier
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good value; the knife is well balanced, feels good in hand, and chopping and slicing while the tip is set down on the board is made more accurate and more easily with the weight of the knife itself lending extra downward energy into the task at hand. That seems to be the best way to handle chopping and slicing, it appears. I don't use this as a "cleaver", but if such a need will arise, I wouldn't hesitate to put it to that task either! I'm growing fonder of this tool with each usage, which is the best one can hope for, isn't it?
customer_reviews.author: Paul R DesRoches

customer_reviews.title: Powerhouse knife!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy duty well-made cleaver the fit and finish is outstanding if anybody complains about a crack they’re not truly worried about the knife it is well worth triple the amount of money that they are asking great buy
customer_reviews.author: wes melton

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Handle
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and buy something else. I should have heeded the reviews that said the handle breaks. After 2 uses to cut chicken, the handle is broken and unfortunately it was just outside the 30 day return window.
customer_reviews.author: Krish

customer_reviews.title: Good Weight. Solid Feel. Good Price.
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged well. Feels solid and sturdy. Handle felt perfect in my hand. Good looking clever. Pretty good price
customer_reviews.author: B-Side

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Received today. Good weight, quality and design for the price. Am pleased and recommend others to purchase this 7" cleaver w/ABS handle.
customer_reviews.author: KULANI

customer_reviews.title: A very good cleaver.
customer_reviews.text: I make a lot of broth. This cleaver makes short work of separating a whole chicken. It is also the right size for average size hands, nicely balanced and not too heavy. I will gift my son one when he has his own kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy G

customer_reviews.title: A must have in kitchen. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect,and a must have in kitchen,if you do lots of cooking. I am hanging it from a utensil holder in kitchen.Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Cajunqueenlc

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: It’s so sharp and sturdy. I’ve purchased cleavers in the past that ended up chipping. This has hold well thus far
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy cleaver
customer_reviews.text: I found the knife very heavy to use and after a while, my hand became very numb and i had to switch to a smaller knife. I found it worked well cutting small meats but not for extended cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn marie

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad price for excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's sturdy and easy to manage. Be careful because is really sharp. But I'm so happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp well balanced cleaver for a great price. Get a heavier one if you want ...
customer_reviews.text: cluck cluck cluck says the chicken and then silence... kidding. Yes I use this from asparagus to zucchini. It's low maintenance, Very sharp well balanced cleaver for a great price. Get a heavier one if you want to chop through chicken/fish bones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: Feels well built wish it had a thinner blade for finely thin slicing but im ready to go kung pow on some meat
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chopper It’s not like those that have handles that fall apart over time This is one complete frame Heavy enough to do cutting of meat even with bones Sturdy and strong I’ve been using this for almost 3 years in the kitchen No signs or rusting for deteriorating A good buy indeed
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking cleaver
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking cleaver, feels good in the hand but I wish it were heavier. Was not very sharp out of the box so it will need sharpening. I will need to buy a real chinese cleaver at some point if I want the kind of cleaver I am really after. Still, this one looks like it will serve me well in any case.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymousslh31718

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and makes cutting easy
customer_reviews.text: Ever have a lot of veggies to manually cut? This cleaver "cuts" through all that in quick time. I love to use it
customer_reviews.author: Clelb

customer_reviews.title: Clever
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sharp, good weight, feels nearly natural in hand. Product arrived quickly, and is as described.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Taylor

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This cleaver is good for what you paid for it. I think it dulls quickly but get a knife sharpener and your back in the game.. Fyi it is a durable cleaver
customer_reviews.author: Yankee

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaver, priced well for once in a while use!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sharp cleaver that I use to chop through meat and fish (with bone on). The knife performed well and chopped cleanly through the bone. I follow the maintenance instructions of cleaning, sharpening and drying it and it has held up well so far. I believe this to be a great cleaver for its price!
customer_reviews.author: Dipobrato Sarbapalli

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: great knife nice weight to it like that's the blade and handle it same metal so don't have to worry about the handle breaking
customer_reviews.author: Boon Philip

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made handle
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Knife seems nice and solid but the handle was cracked out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Sean C. Poole

customer_reviews.title: not as strong as i thought
customer_reviews.text: nice sharp blade, but after one use/wash, the handle is starting to crack already.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and sharp, its a little heavy but thats good...I was shocked it was so cheap, cut right through my chicken bones.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Smerecki

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: great product for the money - good value. I use it to cut food for a raw diet for my dogs and it is able to cut through chicken bone pretty easily. Would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Gina L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: The knife is as described. It’s easy to hold and maneuver, cut through vegetables easily. I haven’t gotten a chance to try it on bones or other rigid materials yet.
customer_reviews.author: liyuan20

customer_reviews.title: Too Heavy/Off Balance for Weak Wrist After Two Carpal Tunnel Surgeries
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like it as needed it - my sisters would have loved it. Unfortunately I had to return it for a hefty charge against the total.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie O.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice chef's knife & cleaver
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 15 year old grandson. He says he wants to be a chef! Hope he stays the course.. he was excited to get these & used them right away. He loves them!! He made a delicious ratatouille. He cut everything up using his new knife & presented a beautiful dish that didn't survive the night. Thank you for the great product (s)! We will be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Dan

customer_reviews.title: Yaz!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great knife. Its sharp & heavy enough to easily split chicken wings at the joint. It is exactly what I wanted and has remained quite sharp. It's a great knife for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Ham

customer_reviews.title: I use mines to cut veggies
customer_reviews.text: I love how heavy it is its a great weight to cut veggies and the price you cant beat it. I did sharpen it before I used it since it didn't seem to sharp but that is not at all a problem when you get such a great price for all that blade .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this cleaver!
customer_reviews.text: This cleaver is awesome. I've had it for 10 months so far and I love it. It looks great. After 10 months of heavy use there are absolutely no signs of any rust or defects. It pretty much looks brand new. I highly recommend this cleaver!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Wonderful

customer_reviews.title: It will chop and cut
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom who is a butcher for 40 years! She gave it a thumb up and enjoy the sharpness of the knife. It has a good weight to it so it will chop the bones and then some!! Great knife for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Ngan Barron

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest butcher cleaver you can get. Easily sharpened for clean cuts. Light weight and will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Chay

customer_reviews.title: Cleaver
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold and use. My wrist is weak but no problems using it. Sharp too!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great for chopping up bones!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it regularly to chop up a whole chicken. Made me life easier!
customer_reviews.author: Fancy

customer_reviews.title: Have a monster cleaver. This one has a good weight; good handle
customer_reviews.text: Has a good grip to it. Not afraid to use it. My profile: 180 pounds, male, and use hammers, power tools etc..; but should be easy for anyone who can use a knife. Why suffer?
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo C.

customer_reviews.title: Made a claim on this item
customer_reviews.text: seems ok I have not used it your driver did not deliver to me the customer, was left with resident I provide the info door code apt# is why I called customer service. you can reverse the claim if you choose.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Chops bone quite easily. Good quality. I’m getting second one for my mom.
customer_reviews.author: lirpanij

customer_reviews.title: Not good as expected I
customer_reviews.text: It’s not easy to hold and I am getting pain at my index finger while holding and cutting.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: I love this knife
customer_reviews.text: I feed my dogs raw so that means lots of bone crushing. chopping and cutting. This knife has changed my life for the better. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: BeeYourSelf

customer_reviews.title: A good heavy blade puts the force where you want it
customer_reviews.text: A good heavy blade puts the force where you want it. The item is made from one piece of metal, like all good cleavers, so there are no crevices in which food residue could build up and you never have to worry about the handle loosening up. I use it mainly to cleave the tips off of chicken wings and then to break the joints between the wings and the drummettes.
customer_reviews.author: Net Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Chef's quality product
customer_reviews.text: I am an obsessive compulsive when it comes to my cookware, kitchen, and utinsels. I am very picky especially about my knives. They have to be razor sharp, straight edge no nick's and must have a 30 degree angle on the sharpened edge. This cleaver has good weight and balance, and it took to a steel nicely. I used it to Julian slice cucumber, chop celery and slice ahi tuna to make fresh sushi for my wife and I. It performed as would be expected from any cleaver of higher value. I would definitely recommend purchasing this cleaver.
customer_reviews.author: jim evans

customer_reviews.title: Sharp but it works and it does a job
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and it works and it does a job. After several tries with this knife it will not get dull easily
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for opening young coconuts for which I purchased it. Way better than the coco jack that I had high hopes for.
customer_reviews.author: H. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Super confortable to use.good price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Nice one to keep at home. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: eliseo pino

customer_reviews.title: 2/3s of the blade useless, otherwise decent
customer_reviews.text: Only the middle 3 inches of the blade are actually sharp. I attempted to butcher a chicken and had to use a paring knife for support because both corners of the blade are completely dull. Good weight, seems decent made, just have to spend extra money to make it usable because it's useless currently.
customer_reviews.author: Rhianna Newsome

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sharp out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sharp out of the box, cuts cleanly. Well balanced. I really like the weight, makes cutting easier, as does the height. Keeps my fingers away from the edge. I think I am going to be really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect chop
customer_reviews.text: this is perfect, have needed one for a couple years. great value, thx.
customer_reviews.author: amethos

customer_reviews.title: Not sharp
customer_reviews.text: I am used to buying new knives that come sharp and may become dull after several uses. Unfortunately, it came disappointingly dull. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Marie T.

customer_reviews.title: Sharp that's right pretty Sharp
customer_reviews.text: So far so good thanks for pretty good....no pretty great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great knife!
customer_reviews.text: For the money this nice is awesome! Very pleased with it and cook the chicken breast chopped it up no problem at all three breasts even though it's Chinese.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: Loooove this cleaver! Fits very well in my small hands, great weight and cuts great! I use it to cut up my chicken quarters and it has no issue going through bone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handle plastic is cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Really solid product except the plastic in the handle broke early on.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Horton

customer_reviews.title: Best knife for its value
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s an incredible knife. It has good weight to it which helps to cut straight through meats and vegetables. I use it for everything that I need to cut with not just meats. What else can I say but for the price it more than pays for itself. It is super charp and cuts great
customer_reviews.author: Eltoro

customer_reviews.title: great for price!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! Kinda heavy, but thats ok too!
customer_reviews.author: Jayson K

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and very sturdy handle. I used to have cleavers with wooden ...
customer_reviews.text: Sharp and very sturdy handle. I used to have cleavers with wooden handles but they would always drip a discolored wood "juice" after washing. I will always only use stainless steel cleavers with metal handles from now on.
customer_reviews.author: FredaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great go to cleaver knife!
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and sharpness of this cleaver knife. This is great for chopping meat especially on BBQ days or taco Tuesday's!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is nice , it is a strong metal and very sturdy. Chops great
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

product_meta.title: Utopia Kitchen 7 Inches Cleaver Knife Chopper Butcher Knife Stainless Steel for Home Kitchen and Restaurant
feature_bullets: Heavy duty cleaver is made from 100% stainless steel
7 Inch cleaver knife cuts easily through large pieces of food and is perfect for bone cutting, chopping and cleaving
ABS+430 handle allows for easy grip and hassle-free maneuvering and the superior quality stainless steel blade holds an ultra-sharp edge providing lasting and superior cutting performance
Designed and built exclusively for the tough day-to-day demands of the commercial kitchen
Dishwasher safe; hand washing is recommended to retain the fine quality of the exceptional blade
